revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CradlePoint |model=MBR1400 |revision=v1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/04/2011 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=UXX-MBR1400 |ic_id=6921A-MBR1400 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3883 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6JB-25 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0,ExpressCard/34 (USB) |expansion_expresscard_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=3 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3883 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=MBR1400-XXX |default_ssid_regex=^MBR1400-[a-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:30:44 |oui_eth=00:30:44 }} :[http://www.cradlepoint.com/products/branch-office-retail-pos/mbr1400-mission-critical-broadband-router Product page]
This device is presumed to be ''[[U-MEDIA]]'' manufactured. :"0500-1131831000" is silkscreened on the board. The ''[[Atheros]]'' GbE switch is presumed to be AR8316.
The default SSID is ''MBR1400-'' followed by the last :three hex digits of the wireless interface MAC.
